glsa.title: Mutt: Heap-based buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A heap-based buffer overflow in Mutt might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Mutt is a small but very powerful text-based mail client.

description.p: A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in Muttâ€™s mutt_substrdup function.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
